page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content:
{OUR LADY'S SCHOOL SURVEY.}
We are making a survey for the{ {Domesday Book}which will tell people in the future what life is like today. The original{Domesday Book}was ordered by William the Conqueror in 1086 to take stock of the land.Then scribes went about the country taking notes by hand,but we can use modern technology. People all over the country are helping with the survey. The district which we were asked to survey is a mainly rural area which lies just south of {Barnstaple}the main market town for much of {North Devon.Grid reference {02520129.}
